channel.title: docker-compose on DevCube
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on DevCube

item.title: Intro docker-compose
item.description: Working with containers is a necessity today for developers. You will likely need to work with some kind of storage or interact with some external service, like Solr or Postgres. You can install the required service on your local machine, which comes with the burden of choosing the correct installation, configuration, etc… Nothing too complicated but takes time. Docker and Containers In short, the container is an isolated process on the host machine.
